original_text: When they had examined me, they wished to set me at liberty, because there was no reason for the death penalty in my case.
korean_text: 로마인은 나를 심문하여 죽일 죄목이 없으므로 석방하려 하였으나

sentences.original_text: they wished to set me at liberty
because there was no reason for the death penalty in my case
sentences.korean_translation: 내 사건에는 사형에 처할 이유가 없었기 때문입니다
